meanings.definition: A slang term for mittens or gloves.
meanings.sent1: I wore my pogies to keep my hands warm in the snow.
meanings.sent2: She lost her favorite pair of pogies at the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear the pogies on its paws like shoes.
meanings.sent4: His hands were like ice without the cozy pogies.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pogies had little snowflakes embroidered on them.

meanings.definition: A slang term for money or earnings.
meanings.sent1: He saved up all his pogies to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She earned a lot of pogies from her lemonade stand.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was overflowing with shiny pogies.
meanings.sent4: In the game, you collect pogies to upgrade your character.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together was music to his ears as he counted his pogies.
